headline.main: CHINESE UNITS PUSH CLOSER TO CANTON; Fighting Reported on Kowloon Railroad -- Sheklung Taken

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Feb. 1 (U.P.) -- Chinese forces exerting increasingly heavy pressure on the Japanese in the Canton area have captured the important port of Sheklung, on the east bank of the Pearl River estuary forty-five miles east of Canton and the same distance north of Hong Kong, a communique announced today.
